Room.Name: Goldenrod Avenue/Taragon Road
Room.ShortDescription: This is the intersection of Goldenrod Avenue and Taragon Road.
Room.LongDescription: A large guard tower stands at the intersetion of the north and east walls. There is a long ramp also, which is used to move heavy equipment to the top of the wall. Stored near the base of the ramp are several old and obsolete catapults, but the village is reluctant to dismantle them, since they are still in working condition.
